function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of hvac systems, use of high-efficiency air filters, and installation of uvgi systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper operation of hvac systems, ventilation, and filtration","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and guidelines development on the transmission of infection through air circulation, implementation of proper ventilation and air purification strategies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monitoring and regulation of environmental factors, implementation of air quality control measures, and education on the impact of environmental factors on virus survival","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of face masks, hand hygiene, and surface control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilize negative pressure isolation rooms, exhaust air fans with high-efficiency filters, and increased air change rate","category":"Air
